channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cram Social Program Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cram Social Program Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1739|2024-09-17T03:13:43.492Z -- ibm -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0.5, 6.1.1, 6.2.0, and 7.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 134921.

item.title: CVE-2018-2001|2024-09-17T03:58:51.036Z -- ibm -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Cram Social Program Management 6.1.1, 6.2.0, 7.0.4, and 7.0.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 154891.
